name: 3D Toy Truck Driving Game
description:
Timpy Truck In Fantasy Land! The best 3D truck game app for kids is here! Start the truck and enjoy the majestic view as you cruise along the track laid out in fantasy land.

Timpy Truck travels in Fantasy Land! Ride around in fantasy land, where penguins roam and snowmen dance in the snow. The truck travels through colorful tunnels! Don't forget to cherish the mountains and ice-cream cones floating in mid-air! This fantasy land is surely magical! Kids will love this truck ride for sure.

What makes this game come alive is the 360 degrees camera view that makes this game an absolute delight.

Features:
* This app is totally free.
* 360 degree camera view
* 3D truck for kids

Timpy Truck in Fantasy Land is absolutely free and apt for toddlers below 5 years of age. Download this kids truck game today and set your child's imagination free!
